## Problem 1

First, clean the data in pols-month.csv

```{r}
pols_month_df =
  read_csv("data/fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv") |> 
  separate(
    mon,
    sep = "-",
    into = c("year", "month", "day")
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    month = case_match(
      month,
      "01" ~ "Jan",
      "02" ~ "Feb",
      "03" ~ "Mar",
      "04" ~ "Apr",
      "05" ~ "May",
      "06" ~ "Jun",
      "07" ~ "Jul",
      "08" ~ "Aug",
      "09" ~ "Sep",
      "10" ~ "Oct",
      "11" ~ "Nov",
      "12" ~ "Dec"
    )
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    president = case_match(
      prez_gop,
      0 ~ "dem",
      1 ~ "gop"
     )
    ) |> 
  select(-day, -prez_gop, -prez_dem)
```
